## IndexPatternsFetcher.getFieldsForTimePattern() method

Get a list of field objects for a time pattern

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFieldsForTimePattern(options: {
        pattern: string;
        metaFields: string[];
        lookBack: number;
        interval: string;
    }): Promise<FieldDescriptor[]>;
```
